page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JON
page.content: ON MONDAY 20th MAY I GOT UP AT 8 O'CLOCK HAVING BEEN TOLD ONCE AND SHOUTED AT ONCE.I GOT WASHED,DRESSED AND HAD CORNFLAKES FOR BREAKFAST ON MY OWN BECAUSE MY BROTHERS WERE STILL IN BED . I WATCHED TV-AM BEFORE LEAVING FOR SCHOOL AT 8.25. WE HAD A VISIT FROM TWO TEACHERS FROM THE ANDERSON HIGH SCHOOL IN PREPARATION FOR NEXT YEAR AND LATER WE WENT OUT SURVEYING STREETS. I HAD A SCHOOL DINNER OF CRISPY MINCE FLAN AND GINGERBREAD AT 12.45.SCHOOL FINISHED AS USUAL AT 3.30 AND I WENT HOME.I WATCHED T.V.UNTIL 5 O'CLOCK WHEN I HAD MY TEA WITH MY PARENTS AND MY TWO BROTHERS.I DID MY HOMEWORK,READ A BOOK AND WATCHED THE HORROR FILM UNTIL 11.45 WHEN I WENT TO BED. {DOMESDAY PROJECT! PRIMARY 7W BELL'S {BRAE PRIMARY SCHOOL,LERWICK 1985. }
